site description: Welcome to james franklin's portifolio. Discover my projects,skills, and contact information.

home.subMessage: A passionate web developer and designer

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a web developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites. I have experience in a wide range of technologies and enjoy learning new things.

items.title: website
items.description: This project showcases a travel website interface with a man overlooking mountains, providing a visually stunning and immersive experience for users. The images capture the beauty of nature and the adventurous spirit of travel.

items.title: work
items.description: This project features colorful 3D code blocks on a laptop keyboard, representing the dynamic and vibrant nature of front-end development. The images showcase the creativity and technical expertise involved in coding and web development.

items.title: work
items.description: This project highlights a stylized login interface with an orange gradient background, demonstrating the focus on user experience and interface design. The images capture the modern and visually appealing design elements used in front-end development.
